subject: What is the solution to test web services?
msgSnippet: Hi I have used JUnit to test J2EE applications, but never got a chance to code web services. How do you test web services, both for unit test and integration
messageBody:
Hi

I have used JUnit to test J2EE applications, but never got a chance
to code web services.

How do you test web services, both for unit test and integration
test?

Jirong
